articles.title: JK Rowling hate law posts not criminal, police say - BBC.com
articles.description: Social media comments by JK Rowling challenging Scotland's new hate crime law are not being treated as criminal.

articles.title: Don't Miss: Total Solar Eclipse, Mars and Saturn Rising, Slim Lunar Crescent, Comet 12P - SciTechDaily
articles.description: What are some skywatching highlights in April 2024? Catch Mars and Saturn rising, and Jupiter hangs out with Comet 12P. Plus NASA has you covered for the total eclipse whether you're headed to totality or watching from afar. https://youtu.be/vr0lysC2bNA Total…
articles.content: In April 2024, skywatchers can enjoy a total solar eclipse visible across the U.S., with Mars and Saturn rising together early in the month, and Jupiter and the crescent Moon pairing up on April 10. … [+5863 chars]
